title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3330/84 of 28 November 1984 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2468/72 determining collection, processing and storage centres for intervention on the market in raw tobacco
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3330/84
of 28 November 1984
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2468/72 determining collection, processing and storage centres for intervention on the market in raw tobacco
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2468/72 is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 November 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 94, 28. 4. 1970, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 164, 14. 6. 1982, p. 27.
(3) OJ No L 164, 27. 7. 1970, p. 32.
(4) OJ No L 267, 28. 11. 1972, p. 1.
